value.title: StarCraft 2: SEAL TEAM SCV! (Florencio)
value.excerpt: This has to be one of craziest builds in StarCraft 2 I've seen. It's pretty simple, quite elegant, and surprisingly lethal: Seal Team SCV. In this cast of StarCraft 2 I give commentary to a match submitted to me by Florencio. Florencio plays some of those most ridiculous build orders I've ever seen in

value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral vs Neeb!
value.excerpt: Serral versus Neeb. A top-level game of StarCraft 2. Both of these players are incredibly good. Serral, the current World Champion of StarCraft and Neeb, the strongest player from the United States of America and of the very few who actually has a positive win loss ratio against the Finnish Phenom.
